column1: Appendix table 4. Standard errors for local jail inmates at midyear, 2006–2016
Report title: Correctional Populations in the United States, 2016   NCJ 251211
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Annual Probation Survey, Annual Parole Survey, Annual Survey of Jails, and National Prisoner Statistics program, 2006–2016.
Author: Danielle Kaeble and Mary Cowhig, BJS Statisticians
Appendix table 4. Standard errors for local jail inmates at midyear, 2006–2016
Note: Population estimates are rounded to the nearest 100. Standard errors are rounded to the nearest 10.
*Unless noted for a specific year, data are based on the number of inmates confined on the last weekday in June.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Annual Survey of Jails, 2006–2016.
